item.title: Free SSL on Github Pages with a custom domain: Part 2 - Let's Encrypt
item.description: GitHub Pages has just become even more awesome. Since yesterday1, GitHub Pages supports HTTPS for custom domains. And yes, it is still free!

item.title: Free SSL with a custom domain on GitHub Pages
item.description: GitHub Pages is pretty awesome. It lets you push a bunch of static HTML (and/or CSS and Javascript) to a GitHub repository, and they’ll host and serve it for you. For free!
